title: Manage Grant for Investigator-Initiated Trial
description: An MSL must process a grant request from an investigator who wants to conduct their own study using the company's drug.

tasks.description: Receive and log the grant proposal from the investigator.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the proposal, including the study protocol and budget, into the grant management system.

tasks.description: Route the proposal to an internal review committee for scientific and medical merit assessment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent routes the proposal to the appropriate review board.

tasks.description: Receive the committee's decision, which is to approve the grant with a reduced budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the committee's decision and the approved funding amount.

tasks.description: Communicate the decision to the investigator and initiate the contract and payment process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a formal notification to the investigator and creates a task for the legal team to draft a contract.
